item.description:
It looks like we're going to have a potluck with board games!! It will be at Lexx's condo in Worcester. We'll provide the games unless you have something really fun you want to bring. And of course we'll all bring the delicious food. I think we should do Buddha Hut before the next scheduled meetup since so many people want to go there too. I'll set it up through here for a couple of weeks from now. I hope to see you all there on Sunday and Have a great and safe New Year's tonight!!!!!


If you have any questions you can reach me at 508-459-1074 or you can email me as well.

See you all soon!!

Stephen
item.how_to_find_us: Dreads, glasses and a whole lot of veganess ;)
item.name: Worcester Vegan MeetUp & EatUp January Meetup
